title: Himi 344
lyrics:
6-8’s
1.
‘E ‘Otua anga’ofa,
Ne ke fa’a tokoni au
‘I he’eku kole atu,
Pea u tangi pea u lea,
Ka koe vaivai ngofua,
Mo e lea li’aki au.
2.
’Eiki, ke ke ‘Afio mai,
Ki he angakovi, ko au
‘Oku ou loto mamahi,
‘I he’eku ta’e a’onga,
‘Eiki fakamolemole,
‘Eku kovi kotoa pē.
3.
‘Ou ou fai he ‘aho ni,
‘Eiki mo e ‘Afiona,
Ko e me’a ‘i ho’o ‘ofa,
‘A e fuakava fo’ou,
Pea ‘oku ou falala,
Ki he ta’ata’a ‘o Sīsū.
4.
’Eiki, ke ke tokoni au,
Pea u ‘alu ‘alu ma’u pē,
‘I he ngaahi hala ‘o’ou,
Hangē ko ho finangalo,
Pea ke foha ’aki au,
‘Eiki, ‘i ho anga’ofa. *
